scripts:
create service user service-user
set ACL for dsg-service-user
    allow jcr:all on /content/dsg
  allow jcr:read on /content/dam
   allow jcr:all on /content/experience-fragments/dsg
 allow jcr:all on /content/cq:tags
 allow jcr:all on /content/projects
 allow jcr:all on /content/dam/projects
 allow jcr:all on /content/dam/collections
 allow jcr:all on /var
 allow jcr:all on /home
   allow jcr:read on /conf
 allow rep:write on /conf
end
